title: Slight Miscut T206 Backs- Four Brands!
author: z28jd

posts.post_title: Slight Miscut T206 Backs- Four Brands!
posts.post_content: All four card be had for $175 dlvd. The Southern Leaguer is obviously slight and beat up, but it is a very tough back to find miscut. Also the Piedmont is harder to find top to bottom like that
Ferris is sold, others can be had for $35 each plus shipping, $45 for the Piedmont or $105 dlvd for all three.
